name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JIRA - Sort and filter assigned users

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort and filter users in the JIRA dropdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension sorts the users in the Show More dropdown and adds a filter at the top of it.

Source code:
https://github.com/nelsoneldoro/jira-sort-assignee-users
